job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Analytics, or a related field.

jd: Hi, Hope you are doing well. Full Stack Python DeveloperLocation: Onsite - Deerfield IL Need only local candidates with DL copy Please share really senior profile Such as 13-14 years of candidate for this role.Candidate Must have previous healthcare or Medical Equipment Manufacturing domain exp Job DescriptionWe are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Full Stack Developer to join our team at Baxter Healthcare. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for creating the pipelines and endpoints that expose data to the enterprise. This position requires a strong background in Python, SQL, Unix, Docker, and RESTful services.Key Responsibilities:* Design and implement data pipelines using Python, SQL, and Unix to ensure data quality and integrity.* Work with Docker to containerize data pipelines and ensure scalability and portability.* Develop and maintain RESTful services to provide secure and efficient data access to stakeholders.* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and integrate data analytics into business operations.* Ensure data privacy and security by implementing appropriate controls and protocols.Requirements:* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Analytics, or a related field.* At least 3 years of experience in endpoint development or data engineering.* Strong background in Python, Flask, gUnicorn, SQL, and Unix.* Experience with Redis, Docker, and RESTful services is highly desirable.* Experience with UI/UX, Javascript, Node.js or equivalent.* At least 3 years of experience in AWS, Azure, or equivalent cloud computing platform.* Strong understanding of data privacy and security principles.* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think critically.* Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Analytics, or a related field plus 5 years of experience.* Bachelors' degree in Computer Science, Data Analytics, or a related field plus 8 years of experience.* Experience with machine learning and predictive modeling.* Certified in AWS.* Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI.* Certification in data analytics or a related field is a plus.
